short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify pore-clogging ingredients in skincare and beauty products online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💡 Comedogenic, or pore-clogging ingredients, may cause acne, even if the product labels say “noncomedogenic” or “oil-free" 

🍀 Use DermiCheck to flag acne-causing ingredients in skincare and beauty products, and make informed choices when shopping online

✅ Based on Acne Clinic NYC pore-clogging ingredients list: https://acneclinicnyc.com/pore-clogging-ingredients
